title: Peptide - given bond energies, estimate C-N -calc

content.question: Two molecules of the amino acid glycine join through the formation of a peptide bond, as shown above. The thermodynamic data for the reaction are listed in the following table. skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
